divs: Sighting Detailsi really do not have the patience for writing. It took several minutes in total-both objects were identical and dimmed out identical. The color of object seemed as though it was on fire-both objects moved slowly east to west stopping about straight up- 90'- and just stopped and began to die off till not visible. Hope that helps. Very, very strange-never seen anything like that before in night sky.
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around January 12th 2013
Summary: two seperate events minutes apart-each time object dimmed/got smaller till nothing there
